This game needs no introduction. The reskinned, reworked big brother of a stand alone mod - Counter Strike 1.6 - of the classic, beloved game Half Life, this game has a legacy that goes back almost 20 years now. Competitive, fun and addictive fps shooter: counter strike global offensive.
bloody amazing game. game-play is smooth and heavily dependent on skill. noob friendly and just way too fun to play
